resources.string: Tracking cost infow and outflow is essential for running a profitable business. Farm Profit Calculator is your mobile personal accountant.

string.name: linkCBOTCorn
string.a: Click here to get the up-to-date futures pricing for corn

string.name: linkCBOTSoy
string.a: Click here to get the up-to-date futures pricing for soybean

resources.string: In order to get to model the crops you need to choose a crop and your region.
1) There is a regional image you can click on to get the specific region at your location. Each state may have multiple regions, be sure to choose the correct region by checking out the USDA map.
2) Click on the crop you\'d like to explore. Then, enter the region which you are located at.
3) You can choose to either enter your own values or go directly to the model (the model will only show regional averages until you set your own)
Also, the USDA banner at the bottom leads to our About page.
Thanks for trying out our app!
How many Acres do you farm?
Click on the number to enter how many acres you farm
What was your yield? (Bushels per Acre)
Click on the number to enter how many acres you farm
The values shown as inputs are initially set as regional averages
